episodes.synopsis: Stewart investigates the incredible super-senses of nature’s most successful hunters, uncovering the science behind their amazing abilities.
episodes.title: Extreme Hunters

episodes.synopsis: Stewart unravels the mysterious superpowers of nature’s most successful killers: the alligator, the peregrine falcon and the army ant.
episodes.title: Extreme Killers

episodes.synopsis: From the seemingly invisible octopus to the deadly electric bolt of the eel, Stewart investigates the powers of nature’s most successful survivors.
episodes.title: Extreme Survivors

video.title: Animal Superpowers
video.synopsis: Actor Patrick Stewart introduces elite creatures with extreme abilities, while a team of scientists unlock the anatomy behind their superpowers.
